title: In FIPS mode, RSA OAEP padding is refused with an error message: "This combination of padding and hash algorithm is not supported by this backend"

labels.name: waiting-on-reporter
labels.description: Issue is waiting on a reply from the reporter. It will be automatically cloesd if there is no reply.

body:
ipa replica installation fails in FIPS mode because the RSA OAEP padding is refused by python-cryptography.

* Versions of Python, ``cryptography``, ``cffi``, ``pip``, and ``setuptools``
  you're using
Python 3.12.5
python3-cffi-1.15.1-6.fc39.x86_64
python3-cryptography-41.0.7-1.fc39.x86_64
openssl-3.1.4-3.fc39.x86_64

* How you installed ``cryptography``
From fedora 39 rpm 

* Clear steps for reproducing your bug

1. install IPA server on a FIPS-enabled machine: `dnf install -y freeipa-server-dns && ipa-server-install --domain ipa.test --realm IPA.TEST --setup-dns --auto-forwarders -a Secret123 -p Secret123 -U`
2. install IPA replica on a FIPS-enabled machine: `dnf install -y freeipa-server-dns && ipa-replica-install --domain ipa.test --realm IPA.TEST --principal admin --password Secret123 -U --server server.ipa.test`
The installation fails with:
```
...
Configuring certificate server (pki-tomcatd)
  [1/2]: configure certmonger for renewals
  [2/2]: Importing RA key
  [error] UnsupportedAlgorithm: This combination of padding and hash algorithm is not supported by this backend.
Your system may be partly configured.
Run /usr/sbin/ipa-server-install --uninstall to clean up.

This combination of padding and hash algorithm is not supported by this backend.
The ipa-replica-install command failed. See /var/log/ipareplica-install.log for more information
```

See also the discussion in https://issues.redhat.com/browse/RHEL-40210
